PROPERTY_INFO.VIEW_PROPERTY: SELECT * FROM property WHERE name = {property_name} AND street_addr = {street_addr} AND city = {city} AND county = {county} AND state_abrv = {state_abrv} AND zip = {zip}
PROPERTY_INFO.VIEW_UNIT: SELECT * FROM unit WHERE property_id = {property_id} AND name = {unit_name} AND unit_number = {unit_number}
PROPERTY_INFO.UPDATE_PROPERTY: UPDATE property SET purchase_date = {purchase_date}, sqr_ft = {sqr_ft}, price_per_sqqr_ft = {price_per_sqqr_ft}, purchase_price = {purchase_price}, market_price = {market_price}, num_of_units = {num_of_units}, notes = {property_notes} WHERE property_id = {property_id}
PROPERTY_INFO.UPDATE_UNIT: UPDATE unit SET sqr_ft = {sqr_ft}, price_per_sqqr_ft = {price_per_sqqr_ft}, notes = {unit_notes} WHERE property_id = {property_id} AND unit_id = {unit_id}
PROPERTY_INFO.ADD_PROPERTY: INSERT INTO property (name, street_addr, city, county, state_abrv, zip, purchase_date, sqr_ft, price_per_sqqr_ft, purchase_price, market_price, num_of_units, notes) VALUES (name, street_addr, city, county, state_abrv, zip, purchase_date, sqr_ft, price_per_sqqr_ft, purchase_price, market_price, num_of_units, notes)
PROPERTY_INFO.ADD_UNIT: INSERT INTO unit (property_id, name, unit_numbe, sqr_ft, price_per_sqqr_ft, notes) VALUES (property_id, name, unit_numbe, sqr_ft, price_per_sqqr_ft, notes)

RENT_INFO.VIEW_1_RENT_AGR: SELECT * FROM rental_agreement WHERE start_date = {start_date} AND end_date = {end_date} AND unit_id = {unit_id}

REPORT_INFO.VIEW_VAR_EXP_REPORT: SELECT SUM(expense_item_cost) FROM variable_expense_report WHERE property_name = {property_name} AND unit_name = {unit_name} AND expense_report_date BETWEEN {start_report} AND {end_report}
REPORT_INFO.VIEW_FIX_EXP_REPORT: SELECT SUM(expense_item_cost) FROM fixed_expense_report WHERE property_name = {property_name} AND unit_name = {unit_name} AND expense_report_date BETWEEN {start_report} AND {end_report}
REPORT_INFO.VIEW_CONT_MARGIN: SELECT SUM(margin) FROM contribution_margin WHERE property_name = {property_name} AND unit_name = {unit_name} AND expense_report_date BETWEEN {start_report} AND {end_report} AND cash_date BETWEEN {start_report} AND {end_report}
